author: dkhaywood
msg: headless viewer's DomainObjectInvocationHandler now checks persistence state directly from NakedObject adapter rather than using its Oid.  This is needed when used in embedded context which has StandaloneAdapters that have no Oids

author: dkhaywood
msg: NakedObjectsSystemFactory now implements ApplicationScopedComponent (a marker interface)

author: dkhaywood
msg: NakedObjectsContext: fixing bug in inSession() - because it calls getSession() would always throw an exception rather than return false
